summary: RECALL 03V527000  CONCERNING STEERING GEAR BEARINGS.  CONSUMER READ A NEWSPAPER ARTICLE ABOUT THE GMC POWER STEERING RECALL.  THE CONSUMER HAD NOT RECEIVED THE NOTICE, BUT CALLED GMC TO GET AUTHORIZATION   FOR RECALL REPAIRS.   VEHICLE WAS MAKING NOISES WHEN STARTING AND WHEN TURNING, BUT GMC REPRESENTATIVE STATED IT MAY NOT BE A PROBLEM WITH THE STEERING.  THE  CONSUMER MUST PAY $90.00 FOR A DIAGNOSTIC TEST.  *AK   *JB
